alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Boone; Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:25PM CDT until May 12 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Antelope County in northeastern Nebraska... Eastern Boone County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of St. Edward, or 8 miles southeast of Albion, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lindsay around 330 PM CDT. Newman Grove around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Battle Creek, Meadow Grove, Norfolk and Hadar. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Antelope; Boone; Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton
